 The 'current' Physics FPS (NOTE: This will NOT be what you expect, you will have to divide by the time since the last check to get the correct average Physics FPS).

The 'current' Physics FPS (NOTE: This will NOT be what you expect, you will have to divide by the time since the last check to get the correct average Physics FPS).
